quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"muscle+bound"的字面组合误判为"肌肉紧绷/发达的"，忽略"bound"的"受限制"含义，未理解其"肌肉发达得行动不便"的核心贬义。
quiz_item.sentence: After months of intense weightlifting without stretching, he became so **muscle-bound** that he could barely bend down to tie his shoes.

option.definition: 肌肉发达得行动不便的
肌肉发达的（如"muscular"的常见义）
